For a major trade show in Germany today, one expects IoT and smart manufacturing to have major attention, especially since Industrie 4.0 was part of a major industrial strategy for Germany first launched in 2011. The Industrie 4.0 strategy has certainly worked in terms of changing both perception and economic growth for the country.
